hopobject.name: Irrlicht
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; de; rv:1.9.0.10) Gecko/2009042316 Firefox/3.0.10
hopobject.body: This project targets at porting the Irrlicht 3D Engine to the BeagleBoard. The project will execute in several steps. First is to fix current issues with the OpenGL-ES 1.x driver. Next, we will optimize the software renderers to NEON in order to support other OMAP processors without ogl-es. And finally we will provide a full OpenGL-ES 2.x driver for a cmplete shader pipeline.
hopobject.shortdesc: The Irrlicht Engine is an open source high performance realtime 3D engine written and usable in C++.
